translation.description: I am a web passionate who likes to explore every new technologies and tools possible. My main technologies are Typescript, React and NodeJS; I also do Java/Kotlin with Spring and Laravel. I really like Javascript/Typescript and ideally I would do a lot of programming during my work days. I would like to help a company grow at it's best and to achieve this I continuously grow my knowledge and explore the new trend to stay on the edge.
translation.reason02: I'm good at listening and I like to collaborate and work in teams.
translation.reason03: I continue learning and progressing to keep innovating and I'm always on the lookout for new amazing techs that can solve real problems.
